title: Enhance romantic microsite with mature aesthetic, music, kiss marks, and animations

requirements.text: Add visible red lipstick kiss mark pattern to the letter background that decorates the paper texture without obscuring the letter text

quotes: where is red lips kiss on the letter

acceptanceCriteria: Red lipstick kiss marks are clearly visible on the letter background
Kiss marks are subtle enough to not interfere with text readability
Pattern appears on the paper-textured background beneath the letter text

requirements.text: Integrate royalty-free romantic background music that plays after the envelope opens
acceptanceCriteria: Background music plays automatically after envelope opens
Music is royalty-free and suitable for romantic occasions
Music volume is set appropriately (around 25%)
Mute/unmute toggle controls work correctly

requirements.text: Redesign color scheme from predominantly pink to a mature romantic aesthetic with varied elegant colors including reds, golds, deep purples, and whites while maintaining romantic feel

quotes: I don't want it like this childish

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses sophisticated romantic colors beyond just pink
Design feels mature and elegant rather than childish
Visual theme maintains romantic atmosphere without excessive pink dominance
Gradient backgrounds and UI elements use the updated color scheme

requirements.text: Enhance firecracker burst animation at intro screen to be more dramatic and realistic with particle effects and sound

quotes: I want the bursting of crackers

acceptanceCriteria: Firecracker burst animation is prominent and visually impressive
Particles burst outward with realistic physics and timing
Animation plays immediately when intro screen loads
Burst effect precedes the 'Happy Birthday Angel' text reveal

requirements.text: Add animated bouquet giving sequence that plays after the question flow and before or during the envelope reveal
acceptanceCriteria: Animated bouquet appears and presents itself to the user
Animation shows a giving/presenting motion
Timing integrates smoothly between question flow and envelope sequence
Bouquet visual matches the mature romantic aesthetic

requirements.text: Implement flying butterfly animations throughout the microsite with natural flight patterns and wing movements
acceptanceCriteria: Multiple butterflies animate with realistic flying motion across screens
Butterfly wings flap naturally during flight
Flight paths are varied and organic (not linear)
Butterflies appear throughout different sections of the microsite
Animation performance is smooth on mobile devices

constraints: Preserve existing letter text content exactly as specified
Keep mobile-responsive design and touch interactions
Ensure all animations remain smooth on mobile devices

required: Elegant bouquet of roses illustration in mature romantic style with reds, whites and gold accents (bouquet.dim_800x800.png)
